objects.text:
• Multiple Smart Wash Cycles
• Digital LED Display
• Energy-Efficient Performance
• Premium Large Capacity Drum

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Innovation
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Clear Time Indicator
• Multiple Wash Cycles with Express and Delay Options
• Premium Large Capacity Drum Design
• User-Friendly Control Panel with Intuitive Dial Selection
• Energy-Efficient Performance
• Sleek White Design with Modern Black Glass Door
• Advanced Temperature Control Settings
• Multiple Spin Speed Options
• Customizable Wash Programs for Different Fabrics
• Easy-Access Front Loading Design
• Compact Yet Spacious Interior
• Anti-Vibration System with Stabilizing Feet
• Clear View Door Window for Load Monitoring
• Smart Function Selection for Specialized Washing Needs

banner_details:
This modern banner is split diagonally, with a bold colored triangular gradient on the left and a clean white section on the right. A sleek washing machine product image sits prominently on the right half, scaled for visual emphasis. On the left, there are three main text layers: “heading_1” and “heading_2” featuring geometric futuristic fonts stacked for a striking tech vibe, followed by the “subheading” in a soft light blue font to introduce the innovative concept. The “description” provides clear, bulleted features in a clean sans-serif font. The “price” is bold and large, conveying value, with a contrasting “cta” text over a rounded blue button (“cta_background”). Subtle design elements like circular and geometric patterns add a hi-tech ambiance.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #0a3d62  
- Sky Blue: #3498db  
- Steel Blue: #275b8e  
- Light Blue (Text): #e1f5fe  
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image showcases a modern washing machine with a clean, minimalist color scheme that emphasizes sophistication and functionality. Dominated by a crisp white body (#FFFFFF), it conveys purity and cleanliness. The control panel adds contrast with deep black (#000000) and is highlighted with a bright digital blue (#00D0FF) display, drawing attention to functionality. The metallic control knob uses a gradient blend of silver gray (#C0C0C0) and chrome black (#2C2C2C), enhancing the sleek industrial appeal. The door rim blends black and gray shades, harmonizing with the overall aesthetic. This high-contrast palette makes it ideal for a sleek, technology-forward advertisement banner.
